T02D2956:35b-0: @35b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal rlo //
T02D2956:36a-0: klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgru @36a * //
T02D2956:36a-1: pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid
T02D2956:36a-2: dang mthun par me tog sngon po la sogs pa
T02D2956:36a-3: sa 'phags pa rnams mngon par mchod nas sa'i cho
T02D2956:36a-4: ga la sogs pa rnams sngon du song nas /
T02D2956:36a-5: sa stegs gru gsum legs par byas la cho ga bzhin du thig legs par btab la /
T02D2956:36a-7: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po lte ba sngon po /
T02D2956:36a-8: mu khyud sna tshogs padma'i phreng ba khyams dmar po sgo bzhi rigs dang 'dra ba /
T02D2956:36a-9: phyi'i mu khyud sbrul 'bar ba rab tu 'khyil pas 'khor bar bris la /
T02D2956:36a-10: bum pa brgyad gtso bo'i bum pa dang dgu la so so'i mtshan ma bris la /
T02D2956:36a-11: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhag go //
T02D2956:36a-12: de nas mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa dang /
T02D2956:36a-13: klu gtor la sogs pa yang bsham mo //
T02D2956:36a-14: de ltar bshams la tshogs sogs pa'i rten nam mkha'
T02D2956:36a-15: la sbrul la tshogs bsag / de nas so so'i
T02D2956:36a-16: mtshan ma dang ldan pas bum pa'i nang du gtso
T02D2956:36a-17: bo snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed /
T02D2956:36a-18: 'khor gyi klu rnams ni lag pa rnams sbrul mgo gdengs pa ltar byas la /
T02D2956:36a-19: aom phu: sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas mtha' yas mdog
T02D2956:36a-20: ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa smad sprul du
T02D2956:36a-21: 'khyil ba dbu la rin po che dang sprul mgo
T02D2956:36a-22: bdun gyi gdengs ka yod pa /
T02D2956:36a-23: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2956:36a-24: g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma bsnams pa bskyed do //
T02D2956:36a-25: de dag kyang gdan padma'i sdong po'i steng na nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du bskyed do //
T02D2956:36a-26: phyag rgya snga ma dang 'dra ba la lho phyogs
T02D2956:36a-27: su aom ba sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas 'jog po
T02D2956:36a-28: mdog dkar po g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma thogs pa
T02D2956:36a-29: snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //
T02D2956:36a-30: nub tu aom bhr'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas ka
T02D2956:36a-31: rko ta dmar po phyag mtshan snga ma dang 'dra
T02D2956:36a-32: ba bskyed do // byang du aom pha sv'a h'a
T02D2956:36a-33: zhes brjod pas au li ka mdog dmar skya snga
T02D2956:36a-35: shar lhor aom phi sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas nor
T02D2956:36a-36: rgyas mdog ser skya snga ma bzhin du bskyed do
T02D2956:36a-37: // lho nub tu aom phe sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas dung skyong sngo skya bskyed do //
T02D2956:36a-38: nub byang du aom pham sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas padma sngo skya bskyed do //
T02D2956:36a-39: byang shar du aom phee sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas
T02D2956:36b-0: ba sun mdog dmar sngo snga ma bzhin @36b bskyed
T02D2956:36b-1: do // de dag kyang sa bon phu las yang
T02D2956:36b-2: dag par 'byung ba rab tu mdzes par bskyed do
T02D2956:36b-3: do // // de nas de dag la mchod pa lnga lnga dbul lo //
T02D2956:36b-4: de nas so so'i ye shes sems dpa' dza: h'um
T02D2956:36b-5: bam ho: sa dgug gzhug byas la bum chu klu'i
T02D2956:36b-6: ngo bor zhu bas chu bdud rtsir dmigs la so
T02D2956:36b-7: so'i yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa'i thugs ka'i yi
T02D2956:36b-8: ge phu: zhes 'od ldan pa la dmigs la snying
T02D2956:36b-9: po rgyas bsdus gang mos pa la brgya phrag gcig
T02D2956:36b-10: / klu'i snying po re re la khri phrag bzlas
T02D2956:36b-11: so // de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa re bya'o //
T02D2956:36b-12: de nas slob ma smyung bar gnas par byas la'o
T02D2956:36b-13: mas gdong bkrus la lag tu klu shing 'bras bu
T02D2956:36b-14: dang bcas pa thogs la dkyil 'khor du bcug la
T02D2956:36b-15: dam tshig dang sdom pa dpog / de nas bum
T02D2956:36b-16: chu bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dang ldan pas dbang bskur
T02D2956:36b-17: ro // de nas gtor ma btang /
T02D2956:36b-20: klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug
T02D2956:36b-21: las rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mar me
